title: On Agatha Christie
description:
As we wrap up our second Agatha Christie novel, we wanted to take a moment to learn about the author. Phoebe speaks with James Prichard, Agatha Christie's great-grandson.


Our other shows are Criminal and This is Love.


Donate to Phoebe Reads a Mystery.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
